name: Hypochondriac
overview: Billed as a contemporary fantasy it was a short adventure written in 2 parts by the Infocom tester, Tom Bek in 1986. It was rediscovered as source in late 2019. It shares many of the resources as Leather Goddesses of Phobos. While playing the adventure you get the idea that it was put together to test a couple of additions to the parser prior to the release of that version of Z-code.
